instructions: Open the Messenger app on your Android phone, and tap the people icon at the bottom of the screen. Tap your person icon with a plus in the top right corner. At the top of the screen, tap Requests. Tap on each message and tap Accept to open the conversation or Ignore to remove the request.

Open Messenger on your phone and tap the People icon at the bottom of the screen. Tap the Conversation icon in the upper right to open a new page that shows your requests. Tap each message and tap Accept to open the conversation or Decline to remove the request.
